jcolibri.cbrcore
Class CBRContext

java.lang.Object
  jcolibri.cbrcore.CBRContext
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class CBRContext
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable

Class that serves as communication between methods execution. In fact will hold the state of the CBR system at any moment.

Author:
Juan José Bello
See Also:
